PHRASE.LANG: Why buy the Hamster Costume one piece at a time when you can have the whole thing at a discount! Includes the head, torso, legs hands and feet. [#Legal]
Pourquoi achètent le Costume de Hamster un morceau à la fois quand vous pouvez avoir tout cela à un escompte! Inclut la tête, le torse, les mains de jambes et les pieds. [#Legal]
Why buy the Hamster Costume one piece at a time when you can have the whole thing at a discount! Includes the head, torso, legs hands and feet. [#Legal]
